name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pano - The only view you'll ever need

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pano gives you a personalized snapshot of a customer in seconds.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Pano surfaces key customer data across your existing platforms and brings it together into a simple, personalized snapshot. While keeping the customer data tools you already use, Pano is able to identify relevant information for a full-spectrum view of a customer, unique to you. 

By integrating with popular platforms, such as Zendesk, Stripe, Hubspot and Slack, Pano brings together key insight without the exhaustive weight of a heavier (and more expensive) platform. No more tab-switching and digging for data. With Pano, everyone can find what they‚Äôre looking for. 

üîç Centralized Customer Snapshot: Pano acts as your personal data detective, pulling in relevant information from all your connected platforms. Say goodbye to manual data gathering and time-consuming tab-switching. Pano consolidates key customer data into a unified and easy-to-navigate dashboard.

üìà Data Insights Made Easy: With Pano, you get a full-spectrum view of your customers, unique to your business. Unleash the power of data-driven decision-making with actionable insights at your fingertips. Whether it's sales trends, customer behavior, or engagement metrics, Pano's got you covered!

üõ†Ô∏è Seamless Integration: We believe in working smart, not hard. Pano seamlessly integrates with your existing customer data tools, saving you the hassle of adapting to a new system. Our goal is to make your life easier, not more complicated!

üé® Personalized Snapshots: No two businesses are the same, and neither are their customers. Pano empowers you to customize your data snapshots to suit your specific needs. Create a personalized view that aligns with what you need to see.

üöÄ Empowering Your Entire Team: You don‚Äôt need heavy-duty training to use Pano. We've designed it to be user-friendly and accessible to everyone on your team. From marketing to sales to support, Pano ensures everyone can find what they're looking for, fostering collaboration and data-driven decision-making.
